General.Name: Adel Kalemcilik Ticaret ve Sanayi AS
General.Description: Adel Kalemcilik Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells stationery products in Turkey. It offers wood-cased lead pencils, coloring and copying pencils, ballpoint pens, mechanical leads and graphite, liquid ink pens, markers, crayons, watercolor paints, erasers, finger paints, modeling clays, and gouache paints; and toys. The company offers its products under the Faber-Castell, Graf von Faber-Castell, Adel, Adeland, Atlas, Mark, Auldey, Lotus, NICI, WOW, Pinypon, Nenuco, Oddbods, and Sluban ve Adeland brands. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Ümraniye, Turkey. Adel Kalemcilik Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. operates as a subsidiary of AG Anadolu Grubu Holding A.S.
